README: This file isn't actually used by the app.  Copy to appSettings.Development.json and set the API key appropriately for local testing (i.e. to the devbot key).

slack.apiKey: API key here. DO NOT SAVE A REAL KEY HERE AND CHECK IN TO SOURCE CONTROL.

tumblr.apiKey: API key here. DO NOT SAVE A REAL KEY HERE AND CHECK IN TO SOURCE CONTROL.
